I/O Network Variable of Generic EtherCAT Slave

I/O Network Variable is a container for all Generic EtherCAT Slave I/O Network shared Variables from the Generic EtherCAT Slave hosted on your EtherCAT Master on your controller.

 
Inputs for ECAT Slave are the Output Channels of the EtherCAT Slave which are Output Channels for VeriStand.

Outputs of ECAT Slave are the Input Channels of the EtherCAT Slave which are Input Channels for VeriStand.


I am using EtherCAT communication and I need to edit the PDO mappings. How do I edit the PDO mappings?

KnowledgeBase: How do I change PDO mappings for 3rd Party EtherCAT XML file?
